channel.title: Lxr from sonic potion
channel.description:
I am flabbergasted by the LXR from Sonic potion its also build with cortex arm 4 , and its great Best feature ? you can morph between kits digital mayham ..substeps probabilty per step Trigger out option 7 tracks plus 2(sic) clock outs
Clock in cv 4 audio outs kit for 220 euro I am in love , best partner for axoloti https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJ8ZfJFOYBc https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D6uZlI1bsRw

item.title: Lxr from sonic potion
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

It Is pretty cool!

I’d love to see the drum algorithms be translated to Axoloti objects. I think the code is open-source, so it shouldn’t be too hard for someone with some DSP chops to do.

a|x

Read full topic
